branchCategory.name: IDF, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Standard Inlet Air Temperature for Asia
branchCategory.description: <p>IDF series refrigerated air dryers are capable of operation on 50 or 60 Hz power for use throughout the world where specific certifications aren't required.  This series includes SMC's largest units with rated flows up to 2,295 SCFM (65 m&sup3;/min [ANR]).</p>

breadCrumb.name: IDF, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Standard Inlet Air Temperature for Asia

branchItem.name: IDF*E, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Size 1~75, Standard Inlet Air Temperature
branchItem.description: <p>Series IDF*E refrigerated air dryers are suitable for use in aftercooled systems with compressors up to ~100 hp (depending on dew point desired).&nbsp; These durable units have simple control systems and are easily serviced.</p>

branchItem.name: IDF, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Standard Inlet Air Temperature
branchItem.description: <p>Series IDF refrigerated air dryers feature improved ambient (113°F/45°C) and inlet (149°F/65°C) air temperatures as well as improved flow ratings over standard models.  With an improved auto drain and standard dust filter, these units will provide years of reliable service.</p>

branchItem.name: IDF*F Refrigerated Air Dryer, Size 100~150, Standard Inlet Air Temperature
branchItem.description: <p>Series IDF*F refrigerated air dryers are larger units with improved ambient (113&deg;F/45&deg;C) and inlet (140&deg;F/60&deg;C) air temperatures.</p>

branchItem.name: IDF*FS, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Sizes 100~150 w/Energy Saving Function, Standard Inlet Air Temperature
branchItem.description: <p>Series IDF*FS refrigerated air dryers are larger units with improved ambient (113&deg;F/45&deg;C) and inlet (140&deg;F/60&deg;C) air temperatures.&nbsp; This energy saving design reduces the amount of heat exhausted by the dryer and can reduce power consumption during periods of reduced demand.</p>

branchItem.name: IDF*D, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Sizes 190~370, Standard Inlet Air Temperature
branchItem.description: <p>IDF*D refrigerated air dryers are our largest units.</p>
